title: Fantasy Book v2#3 (#9) 1983-08
description:
Fantasy Book Vol. 2 No. 3 (whole issue 9), August 1983.

This magazine is a fantasy and science fiction anthology (ISSN 0277-0717) edited by Dennis Mallonee and Nick Smith which I have reproduced here as an OCR'd PDF. Contents:

Burnham, Robert, Jr.: Bramryd the Brave and the Third Wish
Davin, Eric Leif: Homework
Hughes, Kim: Lament for Land-Under-Waves
Linzner, Gordon: The Honorable Design
Long, Amelia Reynolds: The Box from the Stars
Lumley, Brian: The Unbeliever
Luserke, Uwe: The Left Lane
Mayhar, Ardath: A Sculpted Smile
Neville, Kris: The Bull Fights
Nordling, Lee: Curtains
Post, Jonathan V.: Dragons
Salmonson, Jessica Amanda: The Apple Boy
Shwartz, Susan: Heir to Dancers
Wodhams, Jack: The Maroon Is Rue
Zimmer, Paul Edwin: The Shadow of Tugar
